dmca.title: DMCA Notification
dmca.body:
Link to original Document here

From:      HDK <[private]@hotdesertknights.com>
To:    [private]@google.com
Date:     Sat, 13 Oct 2007 18:01:56 -0700
Local:     Sat, Oct 13 2007 6:01 pm
Subject:     DMCA Notification
--------------------------------

Date:         October 13, 2007
 

TO:            Google, Inc.
         
                  [private]
                  Mountain View, CA  [private]                                                                                                                 
Re:     DMCA Notification - NOTICE OF CLAIMED INFRINGEMENT
         [private]

From:   [private]
              President
              Hot Desert Knights, Inc.

RE:       Copyright Infringement 


Notice Under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act
Please be advised that the Google Group known as Gay-Bareback, http://groups.google.com/group/gay-bareback?hl=en, contains a posting by Bottomgosh, titled, RAW AUDITIONS, that takes the viewer to http://groups.google.com/group/gay-bareback/browse_thread/thread/8412e9c4121b2640?hl=en .  That page contains links to illegally copyrighted material.   Also on that page are photos titled HDK-RAW AUDITIONS.jpg, which are owned by Hot Desert Knights, Inc.

The streams and images in question, which are owned and properly copyrighted by Hot Desert Knights, Inc.,   are from the copyrighted work entitled RAW AUDITIONS.  These films are properly copyrighted under Title 17, United States Code.  Copies of the official copyright notices will be forwarded to you at the fax number listed above upon request.

As the complaining party, we provide the following contact information to reach us:

Hot Desert Knights, Inc.
[private]
Palm Springs, CA [private]
Phone [private] FAX [private]
[private]@hotdesertknights.com

Hot Desert Knights, Inc., is the legal holder of the copyrighted works in question and have not given Bottomgosh or the owner of Gay-Bareback at Google Groups.com, its owner or agents, permission to use these copyrighted images.

Please take the necessary steps to remove the offending posting by Bottomgosh as quickly as possible so as to protect the ownership rights of Hot Desert Knights, Inc., and to prevent any further action.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,
[private]
President
Hot Desert Knights, Inc.
 
[private]
